articles.description: Former Spain goalkeeper Iker Casillas said his Twitter account was hacked after a post saying he was gay caused a stir on the social media platform.
articles.content:
Iker Casillas said his Twitter account was hacked after deleting a post which said he was gay. Filip Singer/EPA
Former Spain goalkeeper Iker Casillas said on Sunday his Twitter account was hacked af… [+1212 chars]
